name: integration-push-notifications
description: Web push notifications with service worker, VAPID auth, and React hook
postMessage:
Install: npm install web-push
Install types: npm install -D @types/web-push

1. Generate VAPID keys: npx web-push generate-vapid-keys
2. Set env vars: VAPID_PUBLIC_KEY, VAPID_PRIVATE_KEY, VAPID_SUBJECT=mailto:you@example.com
3. Copy service-worker.js to your public/ folder
4. Use the hook: const { subscribe, permission } = usePushNotifications({ vapidPublicKey: process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_VAPID_KEY! })
